Name: Octopus - Create Chain Deployment NuGet Feed micro service
Description:
Provisions & registers a _NuGet External Feed_ micro service in Octopus that can be used to initiate chain deployments. 
[View the OctopusNuGetDeploymentFeed GitHub page for more information](https://github.com/paulmarsy/OctopusNuGetDeploymentFeed)

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
<#
 ----- Octopus - Create Chain Deployment NuGet Feed ----- 
    Paul Marston @paulmarsy (paul@marston.me)
Links
    https://github.com/OctopusDeploy/Library/commits/master/step-templates/octopus-create-chain-deployment-nuget-feed-micro-service.json

----- Advanced Configuration Settings -----
Variable names can use either of the following two formats: 
    Octopus.Action.<Setting Name> - will apply to all steps in the deployment, e.g.
        Octopus.Action.DebugLogging
    Octopus.Action[Step Name].<Setting Name> - will apply to 'step name' alone, e.g.
        Octopus.Action[Capture Web VM Image].StorageAccountKey

Available Settings:
    VMName - change the name of the VM, default is OctopusFeed
    AdminUsername - specifies the admin username, default is {vm name}admin
    AdminPassword - specifies a specific password for the admin user, default is a random guid
    DebugEnabled - set to true to write out the username and password for the VM administrator user 
    InstallScript - PowerShell script to run on the VM after the service has been deployed, but before starting
#>
#Requires -Modules AzureRM.Resources
#Requires -Modules AzureRM.Network

$ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'

function Get-OctopusSetting  {
    param([Parameter(Position = 0, Mandatory)][string]$Name, [Parameter(Position = 1, Mandatory)]$DefaultValue)
    $formattedName = 'Octopus.Action.{0}' -f $Name
    if ($OctopusParameters.ContainsKey($formattedName)) {
        $value = $OctopusParameters[$formattedName]
        if ($DefaultValue -is [int]) { return ([int]::Parse($value)) }
        if ($DefaultValue -is [bool]) { return ([System.Convert]::ToBoolean($value)) }
        if ($DefaultValue -is [array] -or $DefaultValue -is [hashtable] -or $DefaultValue -is [pscustomobject]) { return (ConvertFrom-Json -InputObject $value) }
        return $value
    }
    else { return $DefaultValue }
}

Write-Host 'Identifying virtual network to connect the virtual machine to...'
$vnetRg = Get-AzureRmResourceGroup -Name $StepTemplate_VNetResourceGroupName
Write-Host "Found resource group: $($vnetRg.ResourceGroupName)"
$vnet = Get-AzureRmVirtualNetwork -Name $StepTemplate_VNetName -ResourceGroupName $vnetRg.ResourceGroupName
Write-Host "Using Azure region: $($vnet.Location)"
Write-Host "Found virtual network: $($vnet.Name)"
$subnet = Get-AzureRmVirtualNetworkSubnetConfig -Name $StepTemplate_SubnetName -VirtualNetwork $vnet
Write-Host "Found subnet: $($subnet.Name) (address prefix: $($subnet.AddressPrefix))"

Write-Host ('-'*80)

Write-Host 'Starting micro service deployment...'
$resourceGroup = Get-AzureRmResourceGroup -Name $StepTemplate_ResourceGroupName -ErrorAction Ignore
if ($resourceGroup) {
    Write-Host "Removing existing resource group: $($resourceGroup.ResourceGroupName)..."
    Remove-AzureRmResourceGroup -Name $resourceGroup.ResourceGroupName -Force | Out-Null
}
Write-Host "Creating resource group '$StepTemplate_ResourceGroupName' in region $($vnet.Location)..."
$resourceGroup = New-AzureRmResourceGroup -Name $StepTemplate_ResourceGroupName -Location $vnet.Location
Write-Verbose ($resourceGroup | Out-String)

$vmName = Get-OctopusSetting VMName 'OctopusFeed'
$adminUsername = Get-OctopusSetting AdminUsername ('{0}admin' -f $vmName.ToLower())
$adminPassword = Get-OctopusSetting AdminPassword (New-Guid).Guid
if (Get-OctopusSetting DebugEnabled $False) {
    Write-Warning "Virtual machine running in debug mode!"
    Write-Host "Admin Username: $adminUsername"
    Write-Host "Admin Password: $adminPassword"
}
$installScript = Get-OctopusSetting InstallScript "Write-Host 'Install completed'"

Write-Host "Starting resource group deployment..."
$deployment = New-AzureRmResourceGroupDeployment -Name OctopusNuGetFeedDeployment -ResourceGroupName $resourceGroup.ResourceGroupName -Force `
  -TemplateUri 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/paulmarsy/OctopusNuGetDeploymentFeed/master/Provisioning/template.json' `
  -virtualMachineName $vmName `
  -virtualMachineSize $StepTemplate_VMSize `
  -adminUsername $adminUsername `
  -adminPassword (ConvertTo-SecureString -String $adminPassword -AsPlainText -Force) `
  -virtualNetworkResourceGroupName $vnet.ResourceGroupName `
  -virtualNetworkName $vnet.Name `
  -virtualNetworkSubnetName $subnet.Name `
  -timestamp $OctopusParameters['Octopus.Deployment.CreatedUtc'] `
  -installScript $installScript
Write-Host ($deployment | Format-List -Property @('DeploymentName','ResourceGroupName','ProvisioningState','Timestamp','ParametersString', 'OutputsString') | Out-String)

$feedUrl = 'http://{0}/' -f $deployment.Outputs.privateIp.Value
Set-OctopusVariable FeedUrl $feedUrl

Write-Host 'Registering NuGet feed with Octopus...'
$credential = New-Object pscredential -ArgumentList @($StepTemplate_BaseUrl, (ConvertTo-SecureString -AsPlainText -Force $StepTemplate_ApiKey))

$registerResult = Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Credential $credential -Uri "${feedUrl}/admin/registerfeed"
Write-Host "$($registerResult.action) NuGet feed: ${StepTemplate_BaseUrl}/app#/library/feeds/$($registerResult.id)"

Write-Host ('-'*80)

Write-Host 'Deployment completed successfully!'
Write-Host "NuGet Feed Endpoint: ${feedUrl}/nuget"
Write-Host "Octopus Deploy Test URL: ${StepTemplate_BaseUrl}/app#/library/feeds/$($registerResult.id)/test"
Write-Host 'More Info: https://github.com/paulmarsy/OctopusNuGetDeploymentFeed'

Write-Host 'Current Feed Stats:'
Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Credential $credential -Uri "${feedUrl}/admin/stats"

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_BaseUrl
Parameters.Label: Octopus Server URL
Parameters.HelpText: Root URL of the Octopus Web Portal that the NuGet feed will connect to & create deployable NuGet packages for e.g. https://demo.octopusdeploy.com/

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_ApiKey
Parameters.Label: API Key
Parameters.HelpText: An Octopus API Key with appropriate permissions to create the [NuGet external feed](#/library/feeds) & perform Octopus deployments

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_Account
Parameters.Label: Octopus Azure Account
Parameters.HelpText:
The [account id](#/accounts) of an Azure Service Principal to provision the micro service virtual machine using.

Must be in the Octopus id format i.e. **azureserviceprincipal-visual-studio-enterprise**

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_ResourceGroupName
Parameters.Label: Resource Group Name
Parameters.HelpText:
The name to use for the Azure Resource Group deploy the micro service into.

_The resource group will be deleted & recreated if it already exists_

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_VMSize
Parameters.Label: Virtual Machine Size
Parameters.HelpText:
Select the size of VM to provision and host the NuGet feed micro service.

Recommended sizes
- _Single user:_ Basic series
- _Test:_ Av2 series
- _Production:_ F series

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
Basic_A0|Basic A0 (1 core, 0.75 GiB)
Basic_A1|Basic A1 (1 core, 1.75 GiB)
Standard_A1_v2|Standard A1 v2 (1 core, 2.00 GiB)
Standard_A2_v2|Standard A2 v2 (2 core, 4.00 GiB)
Standard_F1|Standard F1 (1 core, 2.00 GiB)
Standard_F2|Standard F2 (2 core, 4.00 GiB)
Standard_F4|Standard F4 (4 core, 8.00 GiB)

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_VNetResourceGroupName
Parameters.Label: Virtual Network Resource Group Name
Parameters.HelpText:
An existing resource group containing the virtual network that the vm should connect to.

This resource group, virtual network & subnet must exist prior to running this step and are used to associate with the virtual machine's network adapter.

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_VNetName
Parameters.Label: Virtual Network Name
Parameters.HelpText:
The name of an existing virtual network that the virtual machine can connect to.

**The virtual network must allow two-way connectivity between the Octopus web portal and the virtual machine over HTTP**

Parameters.Name: StepTemplate_SubnetName
Parameters.Label: Subnet Name
Parameters.HelpText: Specify the name of the subnet on the virtual network that should be used.
